title: Three
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR60L
description: Students will become familiar with the high frequency word three in this delightful, simple, and repetitive story. Colorful and detailed illustrations support the emerging reader. Students will have the opportunity to practice the skill of visualizing and to identify the main idea and supporting details.
meta: bears, camels, elephants, frogs, lions, monkeys, pandas, three, tigers
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
